column1: ^ It seems Tim Martin from Wetherspoons is set to MAKE A KILLING in the #gammon sector when he opens his pubs despite lockdown. Every cloud... #coronavirus

#Germany #Coronavirus According to a media report, the federal government's planned economic stimulus package is expected to have a volume of 75 to 80 billion euros. The leaders of the coalition want to discuss the measures to boost the recession-plagued economy on Tuesday.

#USA #WashingtonDC #Coronavirus The number of virus deaths in the United States increases by 1074 to 102,785, according to the CDC authority. The number of confirmed infected increases by 18,123 to around 1.737 million.
